    • askMatchType

      public int askMatchType() throws ChannelClosedException
      This method tells what match type was chosen by the user
      Returns:
      1 or 2 (-1 if an error occurred)
      Throws:
      ChannelClosedException - If connection is lost

    • sendMyPlayer

      boolean sendMyPlayer​(java.lang.String player) throws ChannelClosedException
      This method sends to the user his player and tells if it was received
      Parameters:
      player - Avatar representing the user
      Returns:
      Boolean that is true if user received his player
      Throws:
      ChannelClosedException - If connection is lost

      boolean sendOpponents​(java.lang.String opponents) throws ChannelClosedException
      This method sends to the user his opponents and tells if they were received
      Parameters:
      opponents - The user's opponents
      Returns:
      Boolean that is true if user received his opponents
      Throws:
      ChannelClosedException - If connection is lost

    • tellStory

      boolean tellStory​(java.lang.String story) throws ChannelClosedException
      This method sends to the user the turn story and tells if it was received
      Parameters:
      story - Strings List (turn story)
      Returns:
      Boolean that is true if user received the turn story
      Throws:
      ChannelClosedException - If connection is lost

    • askStartPosition

      int askStartPosition​(java.lang.String positions) throws TimeOutException, ChannelClosedException
      This method sends a list of positions and waits for the users choice
      Parameters:
      positions - Json object (choosable positions)
      Returns:
      Index of the chosen position
      Throws:
      TimeOutException - If user doesn't answer
      ChannelClosedException - If connection is lost

    • askWorker

      int askWorker​(java.lang.String workers) throws TimeOutException, ChannelClosedException
      This method sends a list of workers' positions and waits for the users choice
      Parameters:
      workers - Json object (choosable workers)
      Returns:
      Index of the chosen worker
      Throws:
      TimeOutException - If user doesn't answer
      ChannelClosedException - If connection is lost

      cards - Json object (choosable cards)
      Returns:
      Index of the chosen card
      Throws:
      TimeOutException - If user doesn't answer

    • askDeck

      int[] askDeck​(java.lang.String deck) throws TimeOutException, ChannelClosedException
      This method sends the list of all cards to choose from
      Parameters:
      deck - Json object (cards of the game)
      Returns:
      Index of the chosen card
      Throws:
      TimeOutException - If user doesn't answer
      ChannelClosedException - If connection is lost

    • askConfirmation

      boolean askConfirmation​(CommunicationProtocol key) throws TimeOutException, ChannelClosedException
      This method asks for user confirmation, either to use a godpower or undo their turn, and waits for the users choice
      Parameters:
      key - Key of communication protocol, that specifies which is the request (use god power or undo the turn)
      Returns:
      Answer of the player
      Throws:
      TimeOutException - If user doesn't answer
      ChannelClosedException - If connection is lost
